pages.text: $(li)Feathers are a soft material that can be used to craft $(l:patchouli:weapons/arrows)Arrows$(/l), $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/book_and_quill)Book and Quill$(/l), $(l:patchouli:utility/supplementaries/feather_block)Feather Blocks$(/l), $(l:patchouli:redstone/inspirations/charged_arrow)Charged Arrows$(/l), and the $(l:patchouli:armors/feather_armor)Feather Armor$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).$(br)$(li)They can be found in $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/loot_chest)Loot Chests$(/l) too.

$(li)Some creatures such as $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/bald_eagle)Bald Eagles$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/chicken)Chickens$(/l), $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/crow)Crows$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/environmental/duck)Ducks$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/emu)Emus$(/l), $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/parrot)Parrots$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/roadrunner)Roadrunners$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/seagull)Seagulls$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/shoebill)Shoebills$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:creatures/autumnity/turkey)Turkeys$(/l) may drop Feathers on death.
